Make With Us

people Founder & CEO

Founder & CEO

Professor Steve Mann (PhD, MIT), widely regarded as the Father of Wearable Computing, is an inventor best known for wearable computing, augmented reality, and the invention of HDR (high dynamic range) imaging. Steve is a tenured full professor in ECE at the University of Toronto.

MannLab Canada

MannLab researches, develops and commercializes the inventions of Professor Mann and his closest collaborators. MannLab is a global ecosystem, where creative visionaries of all kinds have come together to shape how humans and technology will interface for the next 40 years, and beyond.
